name: Avocado Toast for Millennials
description:
Give it a minute to load.
Play with the mouse and click on stuff.

I want to eat avocado toast, what do you care? I seriously doubt anyone can become wealthy enough to buy a house by cutting out such a delicious snack. It's not like receiving a $35k loan from your family to start a company. Where you can then get lucky and sell it for a high profit to become a millionaire. Naw, avocado toast is different. It's not some shitty, out-of-touch rich asshole. Avocado toast is amazing.

Context
